subtasks.subtask: Pick up the white plastic cup from the left side of the table.
subtasks.subtask_reason: The white plastic cup needs to be moved to the right side of the table, so it's necessary to pick it up first.
subtasks.move: Move the robot arm downward and close the gripper around the white plastic cup.
subtasks.move_reason: This movement is necessary to grasp the white plastic cup before moving it.
subtasks.issue: Potential issue: The white plastic cup might get stuck between the other cups if not moved carefully.
subtasks.solution: Solution: Ensure the white plastic cup is lifted slightly above the other cups before moving it to the right side of the table.

subtasks.subtask: Move the white plastic cup to the right side of the table.
subtasks.subtask_reason: Once the white plastic cup is picked up, it needs to be moved to the right side of the table to avoid the paper cups.
subtasks.move: Move the robot arm horizontally to the right side of the table and release the white plastic cup.
subtasks.move_reason: This movement is necessary to place the white plastic cup on the right side of the table.
subtasks.issue: Potential issue: The white plastic cup might fall off the table if not placed carefully.
subtasks.solution: Solution: Ensure the white plastic cup is placed gently on the right side of the table to avoid any damage.
